While I love Club Penguin, non-members can't do anything on there. It just now happened a couple months ago that members were able to get decent clothing. Non-members can only have 2 puffles, while members are able to get an unlimited number of puffles. They are also able to take better care of them because they have more available resources such as beds and food trays. Eventually club penguin will loose majority if their players since 2/3 of players are non-members, and they are being treated this way. Not everybody can afford to buy continuous months of membership. This also goes for Animal Jam, only Animal Jam is worse than this.
